newsitem.title: USA: Supertel opens Wingate, buys Super 8 hotel.
newsitem.headline: Supertel opens Wingate, buys Super 8 hotel.

text.p: Supertel Hospitality Inc said Tuesday it opened its first Wingate Inn, near Irving, Texas, and acquired a Super 8 motel in Menomonie, Wisconsin.
The 101-room hotel is Supertel's first Wingate Inn under a development agreement with Wingate Inns LP, a subsidiary of HFS Inc.
Supertel said it plans to open its second Wingate Inn, near Houston's Intercontinental Airport, in the third quarter of 1997.
Supertel's Super 8 purchase is its seventh property in Wisconsin.
The 81-room Menomonie Super 8 was purchased for cash from a private investor.
With the addition of the Wingate Inn and the Menomonie Super 8, Supertel now has 4,335 rooms, up from 4,156 at year-end 1996, the company said.
Supertel owns and operates limited-service lodging properties under the Super 8, Comfort Inn and Wingate Inn names. The company has 61 motels, primarily in the Midwest and Texas.
